scripts.serve:watch: npm run build -- --watch & firebase emulators:start --project social-income-prod --config ../firebase.json --import ../seed
scripts.test: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,functions,storage --project social-income-prod --config ../firebase.json --import ../seed 'npm run test:app'
scripts.test:playwright: firebase emulators:exec --project social-income-prod --only firestore --config ../firebase.json --import ../seed  'npx playwright install --with-deps && playwright test'
